sentence.Network_en: Modelling yourself on someone you admire is not the same as aping all they say or do.
sentence.Network_cn: 以偶像为榜样并不是说要模仿他们的一言一行。

sentence.Network_en: He is good at aping the great minds'voices and gestures.
sentence.Network_cn: 他擅长模仿大人物的声音和手势.

sentence.Network_en: That was in 1967 - 68 , when Albania was aping China's Cultural Revolution.
sentence.Network_cn: 那是1967-68年的事, 阿尔巴尼亚效仿中国的文化大革命.

entry.def: Apes are chimpanzees, gorillas, and other animals in the same family.

example.ex: ...the theory that man is descended from the apes.
example.tran: 认为人类是从类人猿演变而来的理论

entry.def: If you ape someone's speech or behaviour, you imitate it.

example.ex: Modelling yourself on someone you admire is not the same as aping all they say or do.
example.tran: 以偶像为榜样并不是说要模仿他们的一言一行。
只是照搬好莱坞模式的法国电影

entry.def: If someone goes ape, they become very angry and upset.

example.ex: When Colonel Harper found out, he would go ape.
example.tran: 哈珀上校发现了一定会勃然大怒。

auth_sentence.content: Then there is your childish aping of my words.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then there is your childish aping of my words.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then there is your childish aping of my words.

auth_sentence.content: Expressionism aims to destroy by aping the primitive and insane.
auth_sentence.res_content: Expressionism aims to destroy by aping the primitive and insane.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Expressionism aims to destroy by aping the primitive and insane.

auth_sentence.content: And Beeny suggests some people can be too slavish in their aping of Victorian style.
